TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SettingsLoadedEventHandler(object sender, SettingsLoadedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SettingsLoadedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The source of the event, typically the settings class.
A object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Configuration.ApplicationSettingsBase.SettingsLoaded> event occurs when settings are retrieved from a provider. This event fires once for each provider.
